= Introduction =

An Android version is in development. It may also be found on [https://github.com/billthefarmer/accordion Github].

http://accordion.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Accordion.png
http://accordion.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Accordion-25button.png
http://accordion.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Accordion-10inch.png
http://accordion.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Accordion-settings.png

  * Keys: F/Bb/Eb, G/C/F, A/D/G, C#/D/G, B/C/C#, C System, B System
  * Instruments: Standard midi set, defaults to accordion
  * Layouts: Standard Hohner 31 button and two 25 button layouts
  * Fascias: Choice of four images
